name: Fateswap
description:
This 2D plateformer game has been created for 3 to 4 players to cooperate in order to escape from a crazy scientist capable of swaping the souls of the heroes.  With their superpowers, the players will have to resolve the puzzles of all levels to finally face the professor.

Please excuse the bugs, this our first game. The multiplayer online mode is still in progress but the local multiplayer mode ans solo mode are working just fine.

Good luck and have fun!
